name: A Whale of a Time
description:
You are an adorable baby whale trying to make their way back home, but alas, the ocean is dark and full of creatures who want to gobble you up! Use your sonar to navigate your way back home through the darkness to the warmth of your mother's arms again! 

Created for Fall Extra Life 2018 Charity Game Jam in less than 24 hours! Made in Unity. 

Created  by: 

Mathew Thomas (Lead Programmer)

Kimia Zadegann (Background Artist)

Elijah Judy (Sound Designer)

Danielle Wallace (Character Artist)

and Minlin Zeng (Programmer)
